extensionDescription.message: A tool made to check any Hypixel player's last session easily and quickly!

mainOutputErrorHypixelNoKey.message: You do not have a Hypixel API key to use! Please either switch to the Slothpixel API or get a Hypixel API key with /api on Hypixel.

mainOutputErrorNotFound.message: The query "$1" doesn't seem to be a valid player. Search NameMC

mainOutputErrorSlothpixel.message: The query "$1" returned an error. It may be invalid. Switching to the Hypixel API may resolve this issue.Search NameMC

mainOutputErrorHypixelInvalidKey.message: Invalid API key! Please either switch to the Slothpixel API or get a new API key with /api on Hypixel.

mainOutputErrorHypixel.message: An unexpected HTTP code of $1 was returned. Try switching to the Slothpixel API if this persists or try again later.

mainOutputErrorGeneric.message: Whoops! This is an unexpected error. Please report this error with the following: $1

mainOutputSentenceGeneralFirstLogin.message: You logged in to Hypixel for the first time at $1 on $2.

mainOutputSentenceOnlineSettings.message: Your account is using the language $1 and is the version $2 on Hypixel.

mainOutputSentenceOnlineLastSession.message: Your current session began at $1 on $2.

mainOutputSentenceOnlineGamesCount.message: So far, you have played $1 games.

mainOutputSentenceOnlineGamesGame.message: You are currently playing $1 of the mode $2 on the map $3

mainOutputSentenceOfflineSettings.message: Your account last used the language $1 and the version $2 on Hypixel.

mainOutputSentenceOfflineLastSession.message: Your last session started at $1 on $2 and ended $3 later.

mainOutputSentenceOfflineGamesCount.message: During this session, you played $1 games.

mainOutputSentenceOfflineGamesGame.message: You last played $1 of the mode $2 on the map $3.

mainOutputSentenceOfflineGamesGame2.message: This game was played on the map $1 and lasted for $2.

mainOutputSentenceOfflineLastGame.message: Before disconnecting, you played or joined the lobby $1.

settingsSettingsFirstLoginTooltip.message: When enabled, one's first login will be shown in the output.

settingsSettingsGameStatsTooltip.message: When enabled, one's stats from their last game played will be shown in the output, if available.

settingsSettingsLastLogoutTooltip.message: When enabled, one's last logout will be shown in the output.

settingsSettingsRelativeTimestampsToolti.message: When enabled, relative timestamps such as, "a day ago," will be used in combination with the date and time.

settingsSettingsSentencesTooltip.message: When enabled, one's last session will be described in sentences rather than bullet points.

settingsSettingsThirdPersonTooltip.message: When "Use Sentences" is also enabled, the player's name will be used instead of "you", "your", etc.

settingsSettingsHypixelAPITooltip.message: When enabled, the Hypixel API will be used instead of the Slothpixel API. This requires a Hypixel API key.

settingsHypixelAPI200.message: Working API key! Your API key has {{ uses }} uses.

settingsHypixelAPI403.message: Invalid API key! Get a new API key with /api on Hypixel.

settingsHypixelAPIdefault.message: Something went wrong! Please try again later.

historyNoHistoryText.message: Your search history will show up here
